title: User Account - Request for Local Admin Rights
description: A developer is requesting temporary local administrator rights on their laptop to install a development tool.

tasks.description: Verify the user's identity and the reason for the request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician confirms the request is legitimate.

tasks.description: Check the client's policy on local administrator access.
tasks.expected_outcome: The policy allows for temporary elevation via a LAPS (Local Administrator Password Solution) tool.

tasks.description: Use the LAPS tool to grant the user temporary admin rights for a limited time (e.g., 1 hour).
tasks.expected_outcome: The user is granted temporary elevated privileges to complete their task securely.
